description: Tickets are available for President Donald Trump's speech at the NRA convention's NRA-ILA Leadership Forum on Friday, April 28, 2017 in Atlanta, Ga.
title: How to get tickets
title_page: Donald Trump NRA convention speech: How to get tickets
text:
On Friday, April 28, President Donald Trump will embark on a historic moment right here in Atlanta. He’ll be the first president since Ronald Reagan to address the National Rifle Association’s annual convention.
Tickets are on sale now for the those interested in attending Trump’s address at the NRA-ILA Leadership Forum, which will commence at 12:30 p.m. April 28, at the exhibit hall, located at Georgia World Congress Center at 285 Andrew Young International Blvd. NW.
Organizers have not announced Trump’s exact speech time, but hundreds are expected to attend the forum and more than 80,000 people are slated to attend the greater convention, spanning Thursday, April 27 to Sunday, April 30.
Ticket prices range from $10-$35 for the forum, described on the NRA’s site as “one of the most politically significant and popular events in the country.” The forum is one of several events that will take place during the four-day 2017 NRA convention.
The seating chart for the NRA Leadership Forum. (Courtesy of the National Rifle Association)
Other featured speakers at Friday’s Leadership Forum include: former presidential candidate Sen. Ted Cruz, Florida Gov. Rick Scott and Georgia Sen. David Perdue.
Tickets to Trump’s convention speech can be purchased here.
Coinciding with Trump’s speech at the convention, Kellyanne Conway, the president’s counselor, will speak at the NRA’s 11th annual Women’s Leadership Forum at the Georgia Aquarium Friday morning. Tickets are sold out for that event.
Tickets are still available here for other 2017 NRA conventions events, including the National NRA Foundation Banquet and National Firearms Law Seminar.
